content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in nocera inferiore the court ruled in favor of the plaintiffs declaring the dissolution of a community of property and granting exclusive ownership of a real estate complex to the plaintiffs the defendants were ordered to pay their share of the property to the plaintiffs along with legal interest the court dismissed any claims or exceptions made by the defendants the court also confirmed the authenticity of the deceased persons will allowing for the division of the property the courtappointed expert valued the property at 14014250 euros the court granted the plaintiffs request for exclusive allocation of the property and ordered the defendants to pay their share additionally the defendants were found to owe the plaintiffs a sum of 855000 euros for the use of the property the court stated that the costs of the judgment would be divided fairly between the parties overall the plaintiffs were successful in their claim and the defendants were ordered to compensate for the trial costs

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Nocera Inferiore sez. II, 02/09/2013, n.951
